category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_NX_query_variant_bl_method
preference.preference_description: Indicates the query mechanism to be used to get the list of variant configured components. Valid values are where_used/traverse. where_used - Optimum for big assemblies and components are NOT widely used across assemblies. traverse - Useful for less bigger assemblies with components widely used across many other assemblies. This is a site preference.
